verses.verse: Moreover the spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted me up, <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> me unto <S%H413><s%> the east <S%H6931><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> which looketh <S%H6437><s%> eastward: <S%H6921><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> men; <S%H376><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> whom I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jaazaniah <S%H2970><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azur, <S%H5809><s%> and Pelatiah <S%H6410><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the men <S%H376><s%> that devise <S%H2803><s%> mischief, <S%H205><s%> and give <S%H3289><s%> wicked <S%H7451><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%> in this <S%H2063><s%> city: <S%H5892><s%>

Which say, <S%H559><s%> It is not <S%H3808><s%> near; <S%H7138><s%> let us build <S%H1129><s%> houses: <S%H1004><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> city is the caldron, <S%H5518><s%> and we <S%H587><s%> be the flesh. <S%H1320><s%>
Therefore <S%H3651><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them, prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> O son <S%H1121><s%> of man. <S%H120><s%>

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> me, and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Speak; <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Thus <S%H3651><s%> have ye said, <S%H559><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> for I <S%H589><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> the things that come <S%H4609><s%> into your mind, <S%H7307><s%> every one of them.
Ye have multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your slain <S%H2491><s%> in this <S%H2063><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and ye have filled <S%H4390><s%> the streets <S%H2351><s%> thereof with the slain. <S%H2491><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Your slain <S%H2491><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> ye have laid <S%H7760><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it, they <S%H1992><s%> are the flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and this <S%H1931><s%> city is the caldron: <S%H5518><s%> but I will bring you forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of it.
Ye have feared <S%H3372><s%> the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

And I will bring <S%H3318><s%> you out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> thereof, and deliver <S%H5414><s%> you into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of strangers, <S%H2114><s%> and will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> among you.

Ye shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you in <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

This <S%H1931><s%> city shall not <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> your caldron, <S%H5518><s%> neither shall ye <S%H859><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof; but I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you in <S%H413><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H834><s%> ye have not <S%H3808><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2706><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> executed <S%H6213><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> but have done <S%H6213><s%> after the manners <S%H4941><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> you.

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when I prophesied, <S%H5012><s%> that Pelatiah <S%H6410><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> died. <S%H4191><s%> Then fell I down <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> my face, <S%H6440><s%> and cried <S%H2199><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Ah <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD! <S%H3069><s%> wilt thou <S%H859><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> a full end <S%H3617><s%> <S%H853><s%> of the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>
Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> thy brethren, <S%H251><s%> even thy brethren, <S%H251><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of thy kindred, <S%H1353><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> wholly, <S%H3605><s%> are they unto whom <S%H834><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> have said, <S%H559><s%> Get you far <S%H7368><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> unto us is this <S%H1931><s%> land <S%H776><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> in possession. <S%H4181><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Although <S%H3588><s%> I have cast them far off <S%H7368><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and although <S%H3588><s%> I have scattered <S%H6327><s%> them among the countries, <S%H776><s%> yet will I be <S%H1961><s%> to them as a little <S%H4592><s%> sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> in the countries <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they shall come. <S%H935><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> I will even gather <S%H6908><s%> you from <S%H4480><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and assemble <S%H622><s%> you out of <S%H4480><s%> the countries <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> ye have been scattered, <S%H6327><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And they shall come <S%H935><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> and they shall take away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the detestable things <S%H8251><s%> thereof and all <S%H3605><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> thereof from <S%H4480><s%> thence.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> and I will put <S%H5414><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you; and I will take <S%H5493><s%> the stony <S%H68><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> out of their flesh, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1320><s%> and will give <S%H5414><s%> them a heart <S%H3820><s%> of flesh: <S%H1320><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> they may walk <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> mine ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them: <S%H853><s%> and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> will be <S%H1961><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

But as for them whose heart <S%H3820><s%> walketh <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H413><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of their detestable things <S%H8251><s%> and their abominations, <S%H8441><s%> I will recompense <S%H5414><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> upon their own heads, <S%H7218><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Then did the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> their wings, <S%H3671><s%> and the wheels <S%H212><s%> beside <S%H5980><s%> them; and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was over <S%H5921><s%> them above. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%>

And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the mountain <S%H2022><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the east side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6924><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Afterwards the spirit <S%H7307><s%> took me up, <S%H5375><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> me in a vision <S%H4758><s%> by the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> into Chaldea, <S%H3778><s%> to <S%H413><s%> them of the captivity. <S%H1473><s%> So the vision <S%H4758><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I had seen <S%H7200><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me.

Then I spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the things <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had showed <S%H7200><s%> me.
